remarks: The predicate "is a co-atom (lattice hyperplane)."  (Contributed by NM, 18-May-2012.)
statement:
lhpset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpset.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
lhpset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lhpset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
islhp2 $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ W e. B ) -> ( W e. H <-> W C .1. ) ) $.
